message.content:
cs.DB, cs.OS, cs.AR, cs.DC, cs.CR. 

This paper discusses a mechanism for improving the performance and endurance of persistent memory, which is a topic related to database systems (cs.DB) and operating systems (cs.OS). The paper also introduces two key techniques, Eager Commit and Speculative Persistence, which are related to computer architecture (cs.AR) and distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper discusses the impact of the proposed mechanism on system crashes, which is related to computer security (cs.CR).
